<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete Spoke Cluster (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/sites/{site_id}/spokeclusters/{spoke_cluster_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Delete a spoke cluster.
